BIO

A programmer and web-developer that loves the outdoors and adventure. One side I like to sit at a desk to program and get creative.On the other side I like to be outdoors and going out to enjoy what the outdoors has to over me.

I've studied at UCT Stellenbosch, studying the foundamentals of pragraming in C# and SQL as the main focus. At my first job I've worked as a back-end developer for the first few month building my experience up in analytics using SQL and HealthShare technologies.

Also had a chance to test my self in the front-end as a web and web-application developer. Since then my main focus was front-end as it gives me a chance to be creative and challenges me.
